      • getRotationAxis

        public RotationAxis getRotationAxis()
        Get the transformation operator as a rotation axis. For open symmetry this will have a non-zero screw component.
        Returns:
        a RotationAxis for this Axis

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Returns:
        The level of this axis within it's parent hierarchy, or -1 if unset
